price: Dijeron: "Hemos sido enviados [para castigar] a un pueblo de pecadores,
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ مُّجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū innā ur'sil'nā ilā qawmin muj'rimīna
